definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: During construction of the middle drift of a multi-arch tunnel, collapse accident occurred.
sentences.chinese: 某连拱隧道在中导洞施工时出现坍方。

sentences.english: The earthquake caused the collapse of the coal mines in this district.
sentences.chinese: 地震造成了这个地区的煤矿坍方。

definition: to repair in a rush/rush repairs
